lead_paragraph: The musician has collected photographs for 25 years, including vintage prints by Man Ray, Berenice Abbott and André Kertész.

headline.print_headline: Elton John’s Collection in Photo Exhibition
headline.main: Tate Modern Announces Show of Photographs From Elton John Collection

snippet: The musician has collected photographs for 25 years, including vintage prints by Man Ray, Berenice Abbott and André Kertész.
abstract: Tate Modern announces exhibition of singer/songwriter Elton John's impressive photography collection, including rare prints by Man Ray, Berenice Abbott, Andre Kertesz and others.
